Yuheng Zhao Projects Publications Blog CV GitHub

Hello! I am Yuheng Zhao, a PhD candidate in Department of Data science at Fudan University. I am supervised by Prof. Siming Chen in FDUVIS Lab. Before that, I received my master degree with first class honors from The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST) in 2021, with major in Data-driven Modeling.

My research interest lies in harnessing the confluence of Visualization, Human-Computer Interaction, Data Science, and Artificial Intelligence to enhance data expression and comprehension. Specifically, I am focused on visual analytics for social media, intelligent visual analysis in Human-AI Collaboration, and visualization in the metaverse.

News
My dissertation won the IEEE VGTC Outstanding Dissertation Award.

üçí Projects

ContextWing

ContextWing is a visual analytics system which support pair-wise comparison in social media data streams.

Paper Video
OldVisOnline

I am a co-author of OldVisOnline. This work curate the first large-scale dataset (13K) dedicated to historical visualization.

Website Code Paper
Metaverse

A framework that summarizes how graphics, interaction, and visualization techniques support the visual construction of the metaverse and user-centric exploration.

Paper
